articles.title: Google to shut down Album Archive on July 19: Here’s how to back up your data | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Google is shutting down its Album Archive feature, which allows users to view and manage content from different Google products, on July 19, 2023. Users are recommended to use Google Takeout to download their data before then.
